question: who starred in the pirates of the caribbean
api_result:
The "Pirates of the Caribbean" film series features several prominent actors. The most notable among them is Johnny Depp, who stars as Captain Jack Sparrow, a central character throughout the series. Other key actors include:

- Orlando Bloom as Will Turner
- Keira Knightley as Elizabeth Swann
- Geoffrey Rush as Captain Hector Barbossa
- Bill Nighy as Davy Jones
- Kevin McNally as Joshamee Gibbs

These actors appear in various installments of the series, which began with "Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl" in 2003. The franchise has since expanded to include several sequels.
